chat_history.name: accommodation_search

chat_history.content:
# Day 1: Sarasota
## Flight:
Flight F3797423 from Sarasota to Philadelphia departs on 2 March 2022 at 11:54 and arrives at 14:46, taking 2 hours and 52 minutes. The ticket costs $289.

## Attraction:
I was unable to find any attractions in Sarasota.

## Restaurant:
- **Miyabi Kyoto Japanese Steak House**, where you can enjoy desserts, tea, pizza, French food and café fare for an average cost of $22.
- **Barbeque Nation**, which serves desserts, BBQ, fast food, Chinese food and seafood for an average cost of $27.
- **Bharawan Da Dhaba** for desserts, café fare, Mexican food, BBQ and Chinese food at an average cost of $10.

## Accommodation:
Accommodation options in Sarasota include:
- **Apartment for One Person Midtown, Doorman Building**, an entire apartment that costs $453 per night.
- **Clean, Cozy Private Room with TV Uptown Manhattan**, which costs $251 per night.
- **Walk to Times Square, Central Park, Museums, Broadway**, an entire apartment that costs $224 per night.

# Day 2: Philadelphia
## Attraction:
- **The Franklin Institute**, a science museum.
- **Independence National Historical Park**.
- **Philadelphia's Magic Gardens**, a mosaic art museum.
- **Philadelphia Museum of Art**.
- **Liberty Bell**, a famous symbol of American independence.
- **Eastern State Penitentiary**, a former prison turned into a museum.
- **JFK Plaza (Love Park)**, a public space with a famous sculpture.
- **Philadelphia Zoo**.
- **Franklin Square**, a historic park.
- **Rodin Museum**, featuring the work of Auguste Rodin.
- **Rocky Statue**, a sculpture of the character Rocky Balboa from the film Rocky.
- **Please Touch Museum**, a children's museum.
- **Elfreth's Alley Museum**, a historic house museum.
- **African American Museum in Philadelphia**.
- **The Mütter Museum at The College of Physicians of Philadelphia**, a museum of medical history.
- **Museum of the American Revolution**.
- **Penn Museum**.
- **Benjamin Franklin Museum**.
- **Barnes Foundation**.
- **Betsy Ross House**, the former home of Betsy Ross.

## Restaurant:
- **Hong Kong Cafe** for tea, pizza, Italian food, BBQ, café fare and more, for an average cost of $47.
- **Red Ginger Sushi, Grill & Bar** for tea, café fare, Indian food and fast food at an average cost of $98.
- **Marukame Udon** for tea, pizza, Italian food, BBQ, fast food, Chinese food and more for an average cost of $100.
- **Red Mesa Cantina** for tea, café fare, American food and fast food at an average cost of $36.
- **The Moon Under Water** for pizza, Italian food, BBQ, bakery, fast food, Mediterranean food and more, for an average cost of $94.
- **Pind Balluchi** for desserts, tea, French food, fast food and seafood at an average cost of $44.
- **Brothers Dhaba** for café fare, desserts and seafood at an average cost of $52.
- **Gurdas Ram Jalebi Wala** for café fare, desserts, bakery and BBQ at an average cost of $20.

## Accommodation:
- **Brooklyn Room in Hip Neighborhood - Close to Train**, a private room that costs $742 per night.
- **Industrial Loft Living in NYC**, an entire apartment that costs $178 per night.
- **Top floor of an amazing duplex**, a private room that costs $509 per night.
- **Sunny room along riverside on 66th**, an entire apartment that costs $217 per night.
- **Modern Luxury Apartment in Heart of Williamsburg**, an entire apartment that costs $567 per night.
- **Quiet Cozy Chelsea Studio**, an entire apartment that costs $1029 per night.
- **2 BDRM PRESIDENTIAL LUXURY CONDO MIDTOWN 45 NYC ***, a private room that costs $609 per night.
- **Gorgeous Lower Manhattan studio for summer sublet**, an entire apartment that costs $962 per night.
- **PRIVATE BEDROOM and BATHROOM crown heights Aprtmnt**, a private room that costs $1047 per night.

# Day 3: Philadelphia
As the flight on 2 March arrives at 14:46, you will have some time to visit attractions and eat out in Philadelphia on 3 March. You can also book an accommodation for 3 March, or you can stay in the same accommodation from 2 March (you can check with your accommodation provider if they offer a discount if you stay for more than one night).

## Attraction:
See the list of attractions above.

## Restaurant:
See the list of restaurants above.

## Accommodation:
See the list of accommodations above.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
